about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm a passionate IT engineering student at ESPRIT with a focus on web technologies, fullstack development, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity. I'm sociable, ambitious, and energetic - I thrive in team environments and enjoy tackling new challenges.
about.personal: I love turning complex problems into elegant solutions through code.
